body.name: Bliss Disappearing Act Niacinamide Toner - 10 Fl Oz - Pore Vanish™ Complex - Purifies and Minimizes Pores - Alcohol-Free Face Toner - Clean - Vegan & Cruelty Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 5 hrs 27 mins
features: DISAPPEARING ACT NIACINAMIDE TONER: Use Bliss' fragrance-free facial toner to instantly minimize the look of pores while leaving skin purified and refreshed!
SMOOTHS AND SOFTENS YOUR COMPLEXION: Removes dirt, excess oil and dead skin cells in one use for skin that looks instantly smoother. Plus, pores look diminished with just one use!

PORE VANISH COMPLEX: Enriched with all the good stuff, like Niacinamide (that's Vitamin B3) and an incredible PORE-VANISH complex, this pore purifying toner leaves skin clean, clear and unbelievably soft.
PERFECTLY PORELESS FINISH: Dreaming of a poreless complexion? Bliss' toner makes it a reality! It's clinically shown to instantly and effectively minimize the look of pores.
HOW TO APPLY: Shake well. After cleansing, apply with a cotton pad (we recommend the reusable kind!) to clean, dry skin. Use morning and night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this after cleaning my face, and it feels great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded expectations. Bye, bye blackheads & big pores!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the Bliss Disappearing Act Toner every morning and evening (a liberal amount, about 4 squirts onto a cotton round each use) since I first purchased it on 3/14/23 (along with my regular skincare routine using a different brand) I have seen a huge difference in my skin now going on just over two weeks of use!I was pretty skeptical at first that an extremely affordable toner could improve the overall health and appearance of my skin so dramatically, as well as completely fulfill its claims to diminish the size of my pores, purify them without stripping my skin and smooth out the entire texture of my facial skin. But I now see that this very affordable, clean, vegan and cruelty free toner (I only use clean, vegan and cruelty free skincare products) lives up to its name and promises like no other toner I have ever used before. And I’ve used quite a few toners at much higher price points. Simply put, my pores have never been this clean and nearly invisible before. Nor has my skin ever looked this smooth and felt this soft.I initially purchased Bliss Disappearing Act Toner because I had a lot of blackheads/congestion on/around my nose, forehead and chin with large, visible pores. I had tried many different types of products to purify and remove that congestion without any success whatsoever until using this toner.Now I feel extremely confident wearing no makeup nearly everyday. And on the days when I do wear makeup, my liquid foundation looks absolutely flawless because it has a truly smooth and seemingly pore-less face glowing out from underneath.Now that I’ve found this skin changing toner, I’ll never use any other toner except this one ever again. If the rest of Bliss’ skincare products provide results as excellent as this toner, I’ll switch all of my skincare products to Bliss!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It really helped reduce the size of my pores and also keep them clean. I used it at least 2x daily, sometimes more if I'm active/sweating. My only complaint was the smell, it wasn't horrible, just an annoying "dough" smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Buy this item, you won't be disappointed. First of all it comes in a large 10oz bottle, when most I get is a 6 or 8oz. It smooths out your skin, and evens your skin tone. My pores shrunk and I have a youthful glow to my face. I am very satisfied and happy I discovered this product. It will go into my daily routine from now on. The bonus is that Amazon offers it at such a wonderful price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MY PORES ARE SNATCHEDDDD
reviews.reviewText: My skin is smmmmoooothhhhh baby! And soft. Buy! Don’t even second guess just buy. I have sensitive and oily skin and this hasn’t caused issues, snatched my pores like I wanted. My skin looks so good. The acne is hormonal and not related to this product lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A bit irritating
reviews.reviewText: This toner didn’t do much for my skin. I think the niacinamide concentration is too high because my skin feels a bit irritated when I use it. Not much change in oil production but pores look slightly smaller, it hydrates

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Texture gone and pores shrank!
reviews.reviewText: Can I just say how I appreciate the amount you get for the price, the affordability and the ingredients is what caught my eye because I do believe you can get good skin care at a good price but when I tell you I was not expecting to see a difference on the first use. Using this in conjunction with my rice water cleanser my skin is like a babies butt and a lot more even. I have oily skin and live in a hot climate so my pores tend to look bigger but this has made them virtually non existent. My makeup application will be flawless. I'm usually also prone to scarring and I got carried away and picked at a scab from a pimple and you can barely see any hyperpigmentation it's so faint you'd have to zoom in to my face, with continued use it will complete disappear. I love this stuff my new staple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the fact that it doesn’t leave a sticky residue on my skin like so many other popular brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a last found a toner for my face that really does work!My face is clearer, feels fresher and my enlarged pores are definitely smaller.
